item.description:
$20.00 buy in.  No re-buys. No cash game after. Easy going game but please have experience playing texas as the game moves along much faster. Thank you.

******FYI...We do have a dog for those of you with allergies!!*****BYOB although we do have some available.  Please bring a snack to share if possible. Don't forget the "Nina" Dollar also! There will be karaoke for those of you who are out of the tournament first. We also have a few board games if you are bored with that. Please do not be late.

Hope to see you all soon!! 860-217-1285 if you need directions
item.how_to_find_us: When you see the two brick pillars with lights on them, you will bear left up the hill. The driveway is split. Our house is dark brown with two car green garage.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Texas Hold Em' Tournament - 7pm SHARP!!!
